amendment.description: Amendments increase Veterans Administration funding for extended care facilities by $30 million and medical research by $30 million and decrease NASA and EPA programs as offsets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of amendments numbered 40, 28 and 26 as printed in the Congressional and offered en bloc to increase funding in the bill's appropriation for VA medical and prosthetic research and also the funding for VA grants to states for the construction of extended care facilities. These increases are each offset by corresponding reductions in other accounts.

action.text: On agreeing to the Walsh amendments (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
